meanings.definition: A person who engages in wrestling.
meanings.sent1: The rasslers practiced their moves in the ring.
meanings.sent2: The rasslers competed in a tournament last weekend.
meanings.sent3: The rasslers decided to have a friendly match in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: The rasslers grappled with each other like fierce warriors.
meanings.sent5: The rasslers wore colorful costumes as they fought in the arena.

meanings.sent1: Many rasslers gathered at the event to showcase their skills.
meanings.sent2: The group of rasslers traveled together to different matches.
meanings.sent3: The rasslers formed a team and called themselves 'The Mighty Brawlers'.
meanings.sent4: The rasslers stood united, ready to face any challenge that came their way.
meanings.sent5: The crowd cheered as the rasslers entered the ring with determination.
